'''Poseidon Linux''' is a GNU/[[Linux distribution]], originally based on [[Kurumin Linux]], now based on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] developed and maintained by a team of young scientists from the [[FundaÃ§Ã£o Universidade Federal do Rio Grande|Rio Grande Federal University Foundation]][http://www.furg.br/] in [[Rio Grande do Sul]], [[Brazil]] (check http://poseidon.furg.br).
The name ("[[Poseidon]]" was the ''god of the sea'' in [[Greek mythology]]) derives from the large number of [[oceanology|oceanologists]] involved in the development of the system.
The name ("[[Poseidon]]" was the ''god of the sea'' in [[Greek mythology]]) derives from the large number of [[oceanology|oceanologists]] involved in the development of the system.
